resources.string: Contact me on vmax0770@gmail.com with subject "Dubki"
Choose your destination from the list
You can plan your trip in advance.\n\nNow you won\'t be late for early classes!
Nearest dorm or education campus is detected automatically

Hi, HSE student!

Do you live in a dorm in Odintsovo or Dubki?

Start this app before you exit education building or dorm

We will plan your trip.
Unfortunately, the number of users was not enough to motivate me enough to support it. Cool guys stopped to supply up-to-date bus schedule and for some time it has been updated manually
Why wouldn\'t you use Telegram bots @dubkibus_bot and @dubkitrains_bot?
